J - Add a module position to a template.description: Add a module position to a template.
body: <jdoc:include type="modules" name="${1:Type the module position}" style="${2: Type the module style};"></jdoc:include>

J3 - Add a deferred extension JavaScript.description: Adds a deferred script to the page, to start optimizing load of files.
body: JHtml::script('{$1:Extension Script, for example mod_myext/test.min.js}', ['relative' => true], ['defer' => true]);
